name: Capital Bank and Trust Company, Trustee, v. Penn Finance Co. (Heller, Appellant)
name_abbreviation: Capital Bank & Trust Co. v. Penn Finance Co.

judges: Before Kephart, C. J., Schaffer, Maxey, Drew, Linn, Stern and Barnes, JJ.
parties: Capital Bank and Trust Company, Trustee, v. Penn Finance Co. (Heller, Appellant).

opinions.text:
Per Curiam,
The appeal in the above entitled case is dismissed. See opinion in Heller v. Capital Bank & Trust Co., 330 Pa. 174.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Bertram U. Weinberg, with him Maurice G. Weinberg and David T. Kleindinst, for appellant.
Charles C. Stroh, of Stroh & McCarrell, with him Samuel Handler, for appellees.
casebody.head_matter:
Capital Bank and Trust Company, Trustee, v. Penn Finance Co. (Heller, Appellant).
Argued January 7, 1938.
Before Kephart, C. J., Schaffer, Maxey, Drew, Linn, Stern and Barnes, JJ.
Bertram U. Weinberg, with him Maurice G. Weinberg and David T. Kleindinst, for appellant.
Charles C. Stroh, of Stroh & McCarrell, with him Samuel Handler, for appellees.
April 11, 1938:
